wikitext.*:
'''2 Yule''' was the first day in the [[Shire Calendar]], marking the beginning of the year, followed by [[1 January]].<ref>{{App|Shire}}</ref><ref group=note>On a Gregorian calendar, it would approximately correspond to 22 December.</ref> Due to the [[Shire-reform]] the Yuledays always fell on the same days of the week.  2 Yule was always a [[Sterday]] (Saturday).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

Events on 2 Yule:
* {{TA|3019}}:
**{{Cal Travel-Company}}
**First quarter of the Moon<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xlix</ref>
